arStrings.szText: Critical Strikes from {c_important}Sever{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to spawn a pool of {c_important}Blight{/c} under the target that deals {c_random}[((Affix_Value_1 - 10) * Affix."Static Value 0") + Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} seconds.
